name: Khalkos
description: A Medium Aberration with a mix of physical agility and psionic prowess, the Khalkos has unique traits to confuse and incapacitate foes.
memorable: Known for its ability to induce confusion and stunning effects while being resilient to various damage types.
goals: To incapacitate foes with debilitating effects and manipulate situations to its advantage.
relations: Often encountered with other aberrant creatures or as a servant to powerful psionic entities.
environment: Can typically be found in areas of psychic disturbance or ancient ruins.
strengths: Versatile in both physical attacks and magical abilities, with high intelligence and defensive capabilities against spells.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to physical attacks if opponents understand its psionic tactics and abilities.
attacks: Utilizes a combination of claw attacks, psychic stings, and confusion-inducing pheromones.
most_powerful_ability: Psionic Sting, which stuns and deals significant psychic damage to its target.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 17, allowing it to detect hidden creatures easily.
skills: Highly skilled in deception, insight, perception, persuasion, and religion.
additional_information: Advantage on saving throws against spells
Ability to detect alignment of creatures nearby
Can create psychic confusion in a large radius
Ability to increase AC against detected attacks
spellcasting: Can cast various psionic spells using its high Intelligence.
